list_variables.description: A maximum of five VPC security group IDs that are in the same VPC as the subnet                   that is specified in the SubnetId property. For more information                   about security groups and mount targets, see Security in the                      Amazon Elastic File System User Guide.
list_variables.name: SecurityGroups

variables.description: The ID of the file system for which you want to create the mount target.
variables.name: FileSystemId

variables.description: An IPv4 address that is within the address range of the subnet that is                   specified in the SubnetId property. If you don't specify an IP                   address, Amazon EFS automatically assigns an address that is within the range of the                   subnet.
variables.name: IpAddress

variables.description: The ID of the subnet in which you want to add the mount target.
variables.name: SubnetId
